Jeff Sonhouse (amụrụ n'afọ 1968) bụ ónyé Africa America na-ese ihe, nke a maara màkà ihe osise mgbasa ozi ya na-emetụta njirimara Black.
A mụrụ Sonhouse na 1968, na New York City, New York
Ọ gàrà kọleji na School of Visual Arts, ebe ọ nwetara nzèrè B.F.A
na 1998; sochiri ọmụmụ na Hunter College, ebe ọ natara nzèrè M.F.А

Sonhouse na-ese foto, nke na-abụkarị nke ndị isi ojii nke na-ekwu màkà isiokwu nke njirimara.  Sonhouse kwuru, na-ese onyinyo nwoke ojii n'ihi na ọ bụ ónyé m bụ. Ihe osise ya nwèrè ihe ịchọ mma na nkọwa dị ka uwe ọla, ọla na ihe nkpuchi; Sonhouse ga-ejikọta mgbè ụfọdụ n'ime ákwà site na iji mgbasa ozi ngwakọta dị ka glitter, ma ọ bụ beads. Ụfọdụ n'ime ihe osise ya bụ nke ndị ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma ọ bụ na-ezo aka na akụkọ ihe méré eme nke jazz. Ihe osise ya, The Son of the Hypocrite (2008), na-ezo aka n'akụkọ ihe mere eme na ọdịbendị Afrịka.

N'afọ 2002, Sonhouse nwèrè ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya, Tailored Larceny, na Kustera Tilton Gallery. E tinyere ọrụ ya na ihe ngosi atọ, Legacies: Contemporary Artists Reflect on Slavery (2006), na New-York Historical Society.
A gụnyere ọrụ Sonhouse na nchịkọta ihe ngosi nka ọha na eze na Studio Museum na Harlem, Nasher Museum of Art, Nelson-Atkins Museum of Art.
N'afọ 2010, Sonhouse nwèrè ihe ngosi nke mbụ ya na Los Angeles, California na Martha Otero ihe ngosi ya gbanwere, Better Off Dead, Said the Landlord.
